title: [REFACTOR] TUI v2: Replace Viewport::Inline with custom bottom area management

logs.msg: Architecture: Native scrollback (println) + managed bottom area (crossterm). No Viewport::Inline. See ai/design/tui-v2-architecture.md. Phases: (1) Research rendering, (2) Basic bottom area, (3) Port input, (4) Port selectors, (5) Add autocomplete.
